name: Kids ABC & Numbers
shortDescription: An engaging, completely free educational app for preschoolers to learn English and Gujarati alphabets (A-Z, ક-ક્ષ) and numbers (1-10) with clear audio pronunciations.
fullDescription:
Learn English and Gujarati Alphabets and Numbers with this engaging Kids ABC & Numbers app! Designed specifically for preschoolers, it provides a fun and interactive way to master numbers from 1 to 10, as well as the English and Gujarati alphabets.

Numbers: Let your child master counting and number recognition through interactive activities. With audio pronunciations, they will easily grasp the correct reading of numbers in both English and Gujarati.

English Alphabets: Explore the English alphabet from A to Z! Our colorful and educational app aids children in learning the alphabet through engaging exercises and accurate pronunciations.

Gujarati Alphabet: Introduce your child to the world of Gujarati vowels and consonants! From ક to ક્ષ and અ to ૠ, the app provides an interactive learning experience with clear pronunciations.

Key Features:

  • Best early education app for children.
  • Helps easily recognize and memorize alphabets and numbers.

Download now and empower your child's language and counting skills in English and Gujarati!
